oNama.oNama-Info1: has existed since 1993, and our main activity is the distribution of hardware for construction carpentry and furniture.
oNama.oNama-Info2: Dabel is a team of ambitious, capable, young people who are ready for improvement and further progress in providing the best possible services.
oNama.oNama-KljucniJedan: a business facility was built on an area of 5000 m2, where our production, customs warehouse, technical service, shipping and sales departments are located, as well as all the necessary conditions for the quality work of a company that wants to maintain its position as a leader on the Serbian market.
oNama.oNama-KljucniDva: we expanded and opened a branch in Montenegro.
oNama.oNama-KljucniTri: we continue our expansion and open branches in Kosovo, Bosnia, Macedonia, and Albania.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiJedan: Customer care, fair relations with partners, and care for the work environment are a priority for us. We strive to maintain long-term quality, as well as to introduce innovations to facilitate ordering and delivery of goods.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiDva: we are introducing B2B ordering where our partners can order goods at any time.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Jedan: we have been introducing ordering of goods via
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Dva: which is continuously being improved and provides partners with all the necessary information about products.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiPet: Our mission is to act responsibly, focusing on customer care and improving the quality of our products.

usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedan: allows you to use the services and content of its website in accordance with the terms of use listed below. The terms apply to all content and services of the website
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Dva: Users are considered to be familiar with these terms if they use any part of the website, as well as that they accept the use of the content of this website exclusively for personal use and at their own risk.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Tri: has copyrights to all content (textual, visual, and audio materials, databases, and program code). Unauthorized use of any part of the website without the owner's permission is considered a violation of copyright and may lead to legal consequences.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Cetiri: Dabel d.o.o. may inform users about important changes and additions to the terms via email or by publishing them on the website.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Pet: By using the website, you are considered to be familiar with the latest rules on terms of use and privacy policy.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sest: Dabel d.o.o. strives to provide accurate information about products, including images, descriptions, and technical details, but does not guarantee complete accuracy due to possible technical errors. Product colors on the screen may differ from the actual ones.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sedam: The data you leave on the website are for internal use and will be protected in accordance with the Law on Personal Data Protection. We use your data exclusively for processing requests, informing you about offers, and communicating with our team.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Osam: The data will not be published or shared with third parties without your consent.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Devet: The website may contain links to other locations for your better user experience. Dabel d.o.o. is not responsible for the content of external sites.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-ZaposljavanjeNaslov: Employment and processing of candidate data
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Deset: During the selection and employment process, the candidate agrees that Dabel d.o.o. will use their data exclusively for the purpose of selection. The data is stored on internal servers and is not forwarded to third parties.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Jedan: Candidates can withdraw their consent at any time by contacting us at the email address
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Dva: after which their data will be deleted from the database.

posao.posao-PosaoTitl: WE ARE LOOKING FOR WORKERS FOR PACKAGING PRODUCTS
posao.posao-Jedan: If you are interested in becoming a member of our team, you can send us your resume, which we will consider and contact you if a need for new employees arises.
posao.posao-Dva: Applications with a resume should be sent to the address:
posao.posao-Tri: We thank all interested candidates in advance.

kontakt.kontakt-NeradnoVreme: We do not work on Saturdays and Sundays.

kontakt.kontakt-RadnoVremePostaVikend: We do not work on Saturdays and Sundays

brzoPorucivanje.CSV mora imati kolone Šifra i Količina: CSV must have Code and Quantity columns
brzoPorucivanje.CSV fajl nema validne podatke: CSV file does not have valid data
brzoPorucivanje.klikni dugme i usmeri kameru na barkod: click the button and point the camera at the barcode.
brzoPorucivanje.unesi šifru, pritisni Enter i upiši koli: enter the code, press Enter, and enter the quantity.
brzoPorucivanje.koristi Uvezi CSV dugme sa kolonama Šifr: use the 'Import CSV' button with 'Code' and 'Quantity' columns.
brzoPorucivanje.kada završiš, klikni na dugme: when you're done, click the button.
